mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, user_password, user_name, user_birth, user_email, user_mobile, access_token, user_type, regis_date) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{user_password}, #{user_name}, #{user_birth}, #{user_email}, #{user_mobile}, #{access_token}, #{user_type}, #{regis_date})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM user where user_id = #{id}
SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND user_password = #{user_password}
SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE access_token = #{access_token}
